sqlMap.select: SELECT GUDS_ID , GUDS_IMG_CD , GUDS_IMG_ORGT_FILE_NM , GUDS_IMG_SYS_FILE_NM , GUDS_IMG_CDN_ADDR FROM sms_ms_guds_img WHERE GUDS_ID=#gudsId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO sms_ms_guds_img( GUDS_ID , GUDS_IMG_CD , GUDS_IMG_ORGT_FILE_NM , GUDS_IMG_SYS_FILE_NM , GUDS_IMG_CDN_ADDR ) SELECT #gudsId# , GUDS_IMG_CD , GUDS_IMG_ORGT_FILE_NM , GUDS_IMG_SYS_FILE_NM , GUDS_IMG_CDN_ADDR FROM tb_ms_guds_img WHERE SLLR_ID= #brndId# AND GUDS_ID= #gudsIdOfB5m#

INSERT INTO sms_ms_guds_img ( GUDS_ID , GUDS_IMG_CD , GUDS_IMG_ORGT_FILE_NM , GUDS_IMG_SYS_FILE_NM , GUDS_IMG_CDN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #gudsId# , #gudsImgCd# , #gudsImgOrgtFileNm# , #gudsImgSysFileNm# , #gudsImgCdnAddr# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM sms_ms_guds_img WHERE GUDS_ID= #gudsId# AND GUDS_IMG_CD= #gudsImgCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT GUDS_ID , GUDS_IMG_CD , GUDS_IMG_ORGT_FILE_NM , GUDS_IMG_SYS_FILE_NM , GUDS_IMG_CDN_ADDR FROM sms_ms_guds_img
SELECT GUDS_ID , GUDS_IMG_CD , GUDS_IMG_ORGT_FILE_NM , GUDS_IMG_SYS_FILE_NM , GUDS_IMG_CDN_ADDR FROM sms_ms_guds_img WHERE GUDS_ID =#gudsId# AND GUDS_IMG_CD=#gudsImgCd#
